text: A Touch Of Someone Else's Class is the second studio album, under the Alive Records label, by the Nashville, TN rock band, Black Diamond Heavies. Dan Auerbach of The Black Keys produced this album while it was recorded at his Akron Analog Studio.all music | Black Diamond Heavies | A Touch Of Someone Else's Class Also, for the song "Bidin’ My Time", Black Diamond Heavies were joined by Black Keys drummer, Patrick Carney. ==Track listing== ==References== Category:2008 albums Category:Black Diamond Heavies albums Category:Alive Naturalsound Records albums Category:Albums produced by Dan Auerbach
title: A Touch of Someone Else's Class
